channel.title: Idea on John Forstmeier
channel.description: Recent content in Idea on John Forstmeier

item.title: Open Source Hypothesis
item.description: Open source software has had a broadly positive impact on society. Its resources have provided the basis for massive value creation and played key roles as the fundamental building blocks of technological innovation. There are dozens of available examples and it isn’t necessary to address them in this piece. Needless to say, open source has left a lasting mark on the world. But there may be potential for it to do even more.
